title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Furniture Layout", 1934–35
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions and calculations throughout
description: Drawing for furniture layout and rough sketches of furniture for Lady Esther Yacht. Lower center showing plan for furniture layout; furniture lining perimeter of room. Drawing for desk (?) or vanity in center middle; rectangular structure with bench. Upholstered and deeply padded bench designs in right margin. Side elevation of cabinet unit in upper right corner. Decorative objects placed on upper shelves of unit, cabinet door below in open position.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Furniture Layout", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-305-6.
